segments.text: This woman is infuriatingly oblivious to the disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that stupid plate while the sink overflows wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring everywhere, soaking the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's standing right in it without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are climbing on that rickety stool like it's a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is raiding the cookie jar, making a mess of things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, hand outstretched for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can they be so sneaky and disobedient?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back; they're going to break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That beautiful garden view is wasted on this chaotic interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this nonsense right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes on the counter could shatter if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so frustrated watching this preventable mess grow.
segments.speaker: PAR
